changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.resource_network ( id bigserial NOT NULL, parent bigint NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, child bigint NOT NULL, distance integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, ordering ruleform.ordinal_number, CONSTRAINT resource_network_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT resource_network_child_fkey FOREIGN KEY (child) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_network_parent_fkey FOREIGN KEY (parent) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_network_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_network_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_network_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT resource_network_parent_key UNIQUE (parent , relationship , child ), CONSTRAINT valid_distance CHECK (distance >= 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
